Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: Lucia
Reviews.Content: I got it for my husband and he loves it! The size of the camera is perfect and the kit provides everything you can need...The delivery was efficient and on time

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: A. J. Rodriguez "ArtDelSol"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera with a great bundle at a great price.  The only thing I don't use is the itty bitty tripod meant for a tiny point 'n shoot.

Reviews.Title: Excelent camera. Very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Juan Soffia Ahumada "JES"
Reviews.Content: Great camera and lenses. Most of items included in the kit are usefull and make this a value option. The thin i like the most is the easy to use interface. Cannon is getting more intuitive in they OS desing

Reviews.Title: 4 stars
Reviews.Author: F. Cruz
Reviews.Content: Although the item arrived much later than expected, it came in very good conditions as advertised by the seller.Also, when I contacted the seller, always received very courteous and prompt feedback.
